### Steps to reproduce the issue

When I try to install npm, it failed with node-js with the following error
```
/data/home/z2yang/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/binutils-2.37-is2hcc4rqxbah6763grcdcwz3cwkuf62/bin/ld: /tmp/z2yang/spack-stage/spack-stage-node-js-14.15.1-plaupzq4eiclgvsw5373tgqwvsf6w7d2/spack-src/out/Release/obj.target/tools/v8_gypfiles/libv8_initializers.a: error adding symbols: malformed archive
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```

I googled it, found that maybe an issue of binutils 2.37, see https://sourceware.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=28138.
But I am not sure.  @alalazo, could you help check this? 
If this can fix the error, should there be a patch for binutils in spack?
